an5.25:1.1: “Mendicants, when right view is supported by five factors it has freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom as its fruit and benefit.
an5.25:2.2: It’s when right view is supported by ethics, learning, discussion, serenity, and discernment.
an5.25:2.3: When right view is supported by these five factors it has freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom as its fruit and benefit.”
